comments:
Editing project properties
  Java Build Path
    Select a required project on the build path and then press the OK-Button
    ==> the Error Running Jobs dialog appears, message
        ERROR: Running Operation: Operation failed

In the meantime, i change the .classpath-file. But to my surprise, a selection 
of required project is possible, if the java-project was created with eclipse 
3.0M8. 

The error occurs only, if the project was created with an earlier version than 
3.0M8. The error is logged:

can't reproduce. moving to jdt.core.

Is it possible that SetClasspathOperation.updateProjectReferencesIfNec
essaryti(..) has problems with projects older than M8?

The problem would reside in platform land. The description of the project 
doesn't seem to be functional.
it looks like the project description file was corrupt. Not reproducible.
